name: latest_exchange_rates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool exchangeratespro.
Tool description: FREE real time currency conversion and exchange rates updated every minute. Histrocial exchange rates available back to 1990. Over 160 currencies supported.
API description: Get up-to-date exchange rate data with the /latest endpoint. Choose from daily, hourly, or minute updates, based on your plan. Stay on top of the markets with real-time data, delivered with one simple request.

resolution.description: The frequency of updates for the exchange rates. Possible values are '1m' for minute, '1h' for hourly, and '1d' for daily updates.

currencies.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes (e.g., 'USD,EUR,AUD,GBP') to get exchange rates for. If not provided, rates for all available currencies are returned.

base.description: Change the base currency of the returned rates. USD by default.
